headline: Ask HN: What do you think about Salesforce acquisitions?
description: Pretty much the title. I occasionally forget that both Heroku and Slack are owned by Salesforce. Is there any particular reason why Salesforce does not try and integrate them closer into their platform/brand identity? Other acquistions that come to mind are Google acquiring products like YouTube, integrating it with Google+ login back in the day, Microsoft with Skype, Facebook with Oculus/WhatsApp/Instagram. Any reason why Salesforce treats its acquisitions "differently"?
headline_zh-Hans: Ask HN: 你对Salesforce的收购有何看法？
headline_zh-Hant: Ask HN: 你對Salesforce的收購有何看法？
description_zh-Hans: 差不多是这个题目。我偶尔会忘记，Heroku和Slack都是Salesforce的。有什么特别的原因使Salesforce不尝试将它们更紧密地融入他们的平台/品牌形象吗？我想到的其他收购是谷歌收购了YouTube等产品，并将其与当年的Google+登录整合，微软收购了Skype，Facebook收购了Oculus/WhatsApp/Instagram。为什么Salesforce对其收购的产品有不同的处理方式呢？
description_zh-Hant: 差不多是這個題目。我偶爾會忘記，Heroku和Slack都是Salesforce的。有什麼特別的原因使Salesforce不嘗試將它們更緊密地融入他們的平臺/品牌形象嗎？我想到的其他收購是谷歌收購了YouTube等產品，並將其與當年的Google+登錄整合，微軟收購了Skype，Facebook收購了Oculus/WhatsApp/Instagram。為什麼Salesforce對其收購的產品有不同的處理方式呢？
